item.title: Coffee
item.description: Coffee Decaf You can buy ground decaf coffee online on https://th.iherb.com. You can order a decaf americano in Kohub.

item.title: Fixing things
item.description: Fixing things Laptops Ek (see sign in Kohub entrance) https://maps.app.goo.gl/YtSupSdZ7Adi6ghQ6?g_st=aw Phones https://maps.app.goo.gl/detkneyDxiTgNVJSA https://maps.app.goo.gl/9JCQawpnboWu6Lpq8?g_st=ic https://www.google.de/maps/place/lantamobiles(ANJ)/@7.6469089,99.0365148,544m/data=!3m1!1e3!4m6!3m5!1s0x304e03df42f929a7:0x1467c91a42bf1174!8m2!3d7.6484539!4d99.0372801!16s%2Fg%2F11h0y616rm?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDIwOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D Scooters Flat tires https://maps.app.goo.gl/cSukRtbw65ANbrgo6

item.title: Health
item.description: Medical You can walk in to all clinics, Salarin is a good GP, if you want something a bit more advanced with some testing the best bet of the clinics is Dr. Pad in Saladan IMO. You can also walk to the TRPH clinic just down the road. Dentists Lanta Dente

item.title: Money
item.description: The Yellow ATMs will give you 30.000 THB, the others are limited to 20.000 THB.

item.title: Transportation
item.description: Transportation Scooters Flat tires https://maps.app.goo.gl/cSukRtbw65ANbrgo6 Vans lanta living tour (aka phra ae apartments) Ferries lanta living tour (aka phra ae apartments) Transfers: Bao Lanta Transfer: +66 80 224 7060 Lanta living tour 42: +66 95 414 1888 Mun Lanta: https://munlanta.com/ Go2Lanta: https://go2lanta.com/

item.title: Where to buy
item.description: Art supplies: Thai Brand (just before turning to the bridge) Food Chia seeds: https://maps.app.goo.gl/SSbdDpRoSAuAoVUS8 Birthday cakes: hidden tree or captain bakery Photos Passport photo: Kodak shop https://maps.app.goo.gl/gEyhtv4mticYgxL68?g_st=aw Helmets They don’t have good quality, certified helmets there. You can buy cheap on lazada good quality ones under 3h baths (look for “LS2” for example). You can also take a look there: https://maps.app.goo.gl/uswCQvZeskBWi5DR9
